name: King Rama I
role: King and founder of the Chakri Dynasty
what_did:
King Rama I became the first king of the Chakri Dynasty and started the Rattanakosin era.
He moved the capital to Bangkok and helped build the Grand Palace and Wat Phra Kaew.
He also helped write down and organize Thai laws and literature.
why_matters:
King Rama I shaped modern Thailand and started a royal family that still leads today.
He protected Thai culture and rebuilt the country after a time of war.
